General.Name: Can2 Termik AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Çan2 Termik A.S. engages in the operation of a coal fired thermal power plant in Turkey. The company's power plant has an installed capacity of 340 MWm/330 MWe. It engages in the generation and retail sale of electricity; natural gas wholesale trading activities; mining of antimony and precious metals, and coal; and operation of natural gas combined cycle and solar power plants. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Çan2 Termik A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Odas Elektrik Üretim Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
General.Address: Barbaros Mahallesi Karanfil Sokak, Istanbul, Turkey, 34746
